TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit ToolStripTextBox extends System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripControlHost

summary.span: 表示 中的文本框，用户可以在此输入文本。

span.span: Represents a text box in a that allows the user to enter text.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是进行承载而优化。 is the optimized for hosting in a . 托管的控件的属性和事件的一个子集公开在级别，但基础控件是完全可通过访问属性。A subset of the hosted control's properties and events are exposed at the level, but the underlying control is fully accessible through the property. 控件允许用户通过应用程序中输入文本。The control allows the user to enter text in an application. 此控件具有标准 Windows 文本框控件，包括多行编辑中找不到的其他功能。This control has additional functionality that is not found in the standard Windows text box control, including multiline editing. 通常情况下，控件用于显示单个文本行或接受其作为输入。Typically, a control is used to display a single line of text or accept it as input. 你可以使用以启用要输入或显示的文本的多个行。You can use the to enable multiple lines of text to be displayed or entered. 设置和属性设置为`true`以允许更高版本中为多行的文本操作控件。Set the and properties to `true` to allow greater text manipulation in a multiline control. 你可以限制的文本输入到量通过设置到特定数量的字符的属性。You can limit the amount of text entered into a control by setting the property to a specific number of characters. 使用属性，以允许用户键入仅大写形式，并仅大小写或到大写和小写字符的组合控件。Use the property to allow the user to type only uppercase, only lowercase, or a combination of uppercase and lowercase characters into the control. 若要从输入中限制文本控件，你可以创建的事件处理程序若要验证输入控件中的每个字符的事件。To restrict text from being entered in a control, you can create an event handler for the event in order to validate each character entered in the control. 你也可以限制中的数据的所有条目通过设置属性`true`。You can also restrict all entry of data in a control by setting the property to `true`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示利用各种常用的属性设置，其中包括自动完成选项。The following code example demonstrates a with various common property settings, including automatic completion options. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripTextBox.CommonProps#0](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripTextBox.CommonProps/CS/form1.cs#0)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripTextBox.CommonProps#0](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripTextBox.CommonProps/VB/form1.vb#0)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AcceptsReturn { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在多行 控件中按 Enter 键时，是在控件中创建一行新文本还是激活窗体的默认按钮。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether pressing ENTER in a multiline control creates a new line of text in the control or activates the default button for the form.

value.span: 如果按 Enter 键时在多行版本的控件中创建一行新文本，则为 ；如果按 Enter 键时激活窗体的默认按钮，则为 。

span.span: if the ENTER key creates a new line of text in a multiline version of the control; if the ENTER key activates the default button for the form.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果此属性的值是`false`，用户必须按 CTRL + ENTER 以在多行中创建一个新行控件。If the value of this property is `false`, the user must press CTRL+ENTER to create a new line in a multiline control. 如果没有窗体的默认按钮，ENTER 键将总是在控件中，无论此属性的值是什么创建新的一行文本。If there is no default button for the form, then the ENTER key will always create a new line of text in the control, no matter what the value of this property. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示用于设置各种语法常见属性设置，包括属性。The following code example demonstrates the syntax for setting various common property settings, including the property . [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripTextBox.CommonProps#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripTextBox.CommonProps/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripTextBox.CommonProps#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripTextBox.CommonProps/VB/form1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool AcceptsTab { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示在多行文本框控件中按 Tab 键时，是否在控件中键入一个 Tab 字符，而不是按选项卡的顺序将焦点移动到下一个控件。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether pressing the TAB key in a multiline text box control types a TAB character in the control instead of moving the focus to the next control in the tab order.

value.span: 如果用户可以使用 Tab 键在多行文本框控件中输入 Tab 字符，则为 ；如果按 Tab 键移动焦点，则为 。

span.span: if users can enter tabs in a multiline text box using the TAB key; if pressing the TAB key moves the focus.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果属性设置为`true`，用户必须按 CTRL + TAB 将焦点移动到下一个控件的 tab 键顺序。If the property is set to `true`, the user must press CTRL+TAB to move the focus to the next control in the tab order. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示用于设置各种语法常见属性设置，包括属性。The following code example demonstrates the syntax for setting various common property settings, including the property . [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripTextBox.CommonProps#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripTextBox.CommonProps/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripTextBox.CommonProps#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripTextBox.CommonProps/VB/form1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个自定义字符串集合，当 属性设置为 时使用该字符串集合。

span.span: Gets or sets a custom string collection to use when the property is set to .
An to use with .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用， ，和属性以创建，通过比较输入于维护的源中的所有字符串的前缀的前缀来自动完成输入的字符串。Use the , , and properties to create a that automatically completes input strings by comparing the prefix being entered to the prefixes of all strings in a maintained source. 这可用于在其中 Url、 地址、 文件名称或命令将经常输入的控件。This is useful for controls in which URLs, addresses, file names, or commands will be frequently entered. 使用属性是可选的但您必须设置属性`CustomSource`才能使用。The use of the property is optional, but you must set the property to `CustomSource` in order to use . 必须使用和属性组合在一起。You must use the and properties together. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示用于设置各种语法常见属性设置，包括属性。The following code example demonstrates the syntax for setting various common property settings, including the property . summary.span: 获取一个值，该值指示用户是否能够撤消 控件中的前一操作。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the user can undo the previous operation in a control.

value.span: 如果用户可以撤消在文本框控件中执行的前一操作，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the user can undo the previous operation performed in a text box control; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果此方法返回`true`，可以调用方法来撤消中的最后一个操作。If this method returns `true`, you can call the method to undo the last operation in a .

One of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以使用属性可以更改为按你的应用程序所需的字符的大小写。You can use the property to change the case of characters as required by your application. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示用于设置各种语法常见属性设置，包括属性。The following code example demonstrates the syntax for setting various common property settings, including the property . span.span: Clears information about the most recent operation from the undo buffer of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用此方法以防止重复，撤消操作根据你的应用程序的状态。You can use this method to prevent an undo operation from repeating, based on the state of your application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以使用此方法，而不是使用类中，以将中的文本复制并将其放到剪贴板中。You can use this method, instead of using the class, to copy text in the and place it in the Clipboard.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 为了保持更好的性能，不应设置的其构造函数中。In order to maintain better performance, you should not set the of a in its constructor. 首选的方法是重写属性。The preferred method is to override the property.

para.span: 在重写派生类中的属性，它是更可取的方法返回对象所需的维度，而不是重写所有的实现。

span.span: When overriding the property in a derived class, it is preferable to return a object with the desired dimensions rather than overriding all the implementation.

span.span: Specifies that the value of the property is zero so that no characters are selected in the control.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance char GetCharFromPosition(valuetype System.Drawing.Point pt) cil managed
Public Function GetCharFromPosition (pt As Point) As Char

param.name: pt
param.span: 查找距离最近的字符的位置。

span.span: The location from which to seek the nearest character.

summary.span: 检索控件内距离指定位置最近的字符。

span.span: Retrieves the character that is closest to the specified location within the control.
The character at the specified location.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果在指定位置`pt`控件中指定的点到距离最近的字符串的第一个字符的工作区以外的参数是`pt`返回。If the location specified in the `pt` parameter is outside the client area of the control, the first character of the string closest to the point specified in `pt` is returned. 可以使用此方法来确定哪些字符位于控件内的特定点附近。You can use this method to determine which characters are located near a specific point within the control. 然后可以使用此值在该位置的文本上执行操作。You can then use this value to perform operations on the text at that location. > [!NOTE] > 如果中的指定的位置`pt`参数位于控件中指定的点到距离最近的字符串的最后一个字符的工作区右侧`pt`返回。If the specified location in the `pt` parameter is located on the right side of the client area of the control, the last character of the string closest to the point specified in `pt` is returned.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance int32 GetCharIndexFromPosition(valuetype System.Drawing.Point pt) cil managed
Public Function GetCharIndexFromPosition (pt As Point) As Integer

span.span: The location to search.

summary.span: 检索距离指定位置最近的字符索引。

span.span: Retrieves the index of the character nearest to the specified location.

returns.span: 位于指定位置的从零开始的字符索引。

span.span: The zero-based character index at the specified location.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法返回与指定的位置最接近的字符索引`pt`参数。This method returns the character index that is closest to the position specified in the `pt` parameter. 字符索引是文本的在控件中，包括空格中的从零开始索引。The character index is a zero-based index of text in the control, including spaces. 此方法可用于确定在文本中用户在其上将鼠标放将鼠标坐标传递给此方法。You can use this method to determine where in the text the user has the mouse over by passing the mouse coordinates to this method. 这很有用，如果你想要在鼠标指针悬停在该控件的文本中的单词时执行任务。This can be useful if you want to perform tasks when the mouse pointer hovers over a word in the text of the control.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance int32 GetFirstCharIndexFromLine(int32 lineNumber) cil managed
Public Function GetFirstCharIndexFromLine (lineNumber As Integer) As Integer

param.name: lineNumber
param.span: 要获取其第一个字符的索引的行。

span.span: The line for which to get the index of its first character.

summary.span: 检索给定行第一个字符的索引。

span.span: Retrieves the index of the first character of a given line.

returns.span: 位于指定行的从零开始的字符索引。

span.span: The zero-based character index in the specified line.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果`lineNum`参数是负数，返回 0。If the `lineNum` parameter is negative, returns 0. 如果`lineNum`参数超过在控件中，行数控件中返回的最后一行的第一个字符索引。If the `lineNum` parameter exceeds the number of lines in the control, returns the first character index for the last line in the control. 返回物理行的第一个字符索引。 returns the first character index of a physical line. 物理行是显示的行中，不是分配行。The physical line is the displayed line, not the assigned line. 显示的行数可以大于由于自动换行分配行数。The number of displayed lines can be greater than the number of assigned lines due to word wrap. 例如，如果分配到两个长行控件并设置和到`true`，两个已分配的长行产生四个物理 （或显示行）。For example, if you assign two long lines to a control and set and to `true`, the two long assigned lines result in four physical (or displayed lines).

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance int32 GetFirstCharIndexOfCurrentLine() cil managed

summary.span: 检索当前行的第一个字符的索引。

span.span: Retrieves the index of the first character of the current line.

returns.span: 当前行中从零开始的字符索引。

span.span: The zero-based character index in the current line.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance int32 GetLineFromCharIndex(int32 index) cil managed
Public Function GetLineFromCharIndex (index As Integer) As Integer

param.name: index
param.span: 要搜索的字符索引位置。

span.span: The character index position to search.

summary.span: 从控件文本内的指定字符位置检索行号。

span.span: Retrieves the line number from the specified character position within the text of the control.

returns.span: 字符索引所在的从零开始的行号。

span.span: The zero-based line number in which the character index is located.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法可用于确定基于中指定的字符索引的行号`index`的方法参数。This method enables you to determine the line number based on the character index specified in the `index` parameter of the method. 控件中的文本的第一行返回值零。The first line of text in the control returns the value zero. 方法返回的物理行号的索引的字符所在的位置在控件内。The method returns the physical line number where the indexed character is located within the control. 例如，如果第一个逻辑行中的文本的一部分控件换行到下一行，方法返回 1，如果指定的字符索引处的字符已经换行到第二个物理行。For example, if a portion of the first logical line of text in the control wraps to the next line, the method returns 1 if the character at the specified character index has wrapped to the second physical line. 如果设置为`false`、 行的任何部分被换到下一行，并且该方法返回对指定的字符索引为 0。If is set to `false`, no portion of the line wraps to the next, and the method returns 0 for the specified character index. 此方法可用于确定哪一行是位于特定的字符索引。You can use this method to determine which line a specific character index is located within. 例如，在调用方法来搜索的文本，你可以获取到找到搜索结果的字符索引。For example, after calling the method to search for text, you can obtain the character index to where the search results are found. 你可以调用此方法返回的字符索引与找不到方法，以确定其行单词。You can call this method with the character index returned by the method to determine which line the word was found. > [!NOTE] > 如果在中指定的字符索引`index`参数为超出可用的控件内包含的行数，则返回最后一个行号。If the character index specified in the `index` parameter is beyond the available number of lines contained within the control, the last line number is returned.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance valuetype System.Drawing.Point GetPositionFromCharIndex(int32 index) cil managed
Public Function GetPositionFromCharIndex (index As Integer) As Point

param.name: index
param.span: 要检索其位置的字符索引。

span.span: The index of the character for which to retrieve the location.

summary.span: 检索控件内指定字符索引处的位置。

span.span: Retrieves the location within the control at the specified character index.
The location of the specified character.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法可确定在控件中特定的字符索引所在的位置。This method enables you to determine where in the control a specific character index is located. 此方法可用于任务，如在控件中显示快捷菜单项或帮助信息的单词。You can use this method for such tasks as displaying shortcut menu items or help information for a word in the control. 例如，如果你想要向用户显示的菜单选项，当用户右键单击控件中的单词上，你可以使用此方法来确定单词以正确显示的位置控件。For example, if you wanted to display a menu of options to the user when the user right clicks on a word in the control, you can use this method to determine the position of the word to properly display a control.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool HideSelection { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示当文本框控件没有焦点时，该控件中选定的文本是否保持突出显示。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the selected text in the text box control remains highlighted when the control loses focus.

value.span: 如果当文本框控件没有焦点时，选定文本不突出显示，则为 ；如果当文本框控件没有焦点时，选定文本保持突出显示，则为 。

span.span: if the selected text does not appear highlighted when the text box control loses focus; , if the selected text remains highlighted when the text box control loses focus.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性可用于保留而另一个窗体或对话框中具有焦点，如拼写检查器对话框中，在文本框控件中突出显示的文本。You can use this property to keep text highlighted in a text box control while another form or a dialog box has focus, such as a spelling checker dialog box. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示用于设置各种语法常见属性设置，包括属性。The following code example demonstrates the syntax for setting various common property settings, including the property . [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripTextBox.CommonProps#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripTextBox.CommonProps/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripTextBox.CommonProps#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripTextBox.CommonProps/VB/form1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event HideSelectionChanged As EventHandler

summary.span: 当 属性的值更改时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the value of the property changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换与或追加到一个多行消息。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`ToolStripTextBox1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `ToolStripTextBox1`. 然后，确保与事件处理程序事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#614](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#614)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#614](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#614)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property cli::array <System::String ^> ^ Lines { cli::array <System::String ^> ^ get(); void set(cli::array <System::String ^> ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置 控件中的文本行。

span.span: Gets or sets the lines of text in a control.

value.span: 包含文本框控件中的文本的字符串数组。

span.span: An array of strings that contains the text in a text box control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 数组中的每个元素将成为在文本框控件中文本的行。Each element in the array becomes a line of text in the text box control. 如果文本框控件的属性设置为`true`和换行字符的文本中出现，换行字符后面的文本是添加到数组中的新元素，并显示在单独一行上。If the property of the text box control is set to `true` and a newline character appears in the text, the text following the newline character is added to a new element in the array and displayed on a separate line.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int MaxLength { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置用户可在文本框控件中键入或粘贴的最大字符数。

span.span: Gets or sets the maximum number of characters the user can type or paste into the text box control.

value.span: 可以在文本框控件中输入的字符数。

span.span: The number of characters that can be entered into the control.
The default is 32767 characters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用此属性，以限制为如邮政编码和电话号码的值输入控件中的文本的长度或将输入数据时要输入在数据库中的文本的长度限制。You can use this property to restrict the length of text entered in the control for values such as postal codes and telephone numbers, or to restrict the length of text entered when the data is to be entered in a database. 你可以限制到数据库中的对应字段的最大长度文本框控件中输入的文本。You can limit the text entered into the control to the maximum length of the corresponding field in the database. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示用于设置各种语法常见属性设置，包括属性。The following code example demonstrates the syntax for setting various common property settings, including the property . [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripTextBox.CommonProps#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripTextBox.CommonProps/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripTextBox.CommonProps#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripTextBox.CommonProps/VB/form1.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool Modified { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示自创建 控件或上次设置该控件的内容后，用户修改了该控件。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates that the control has been modified by the user since the control was created or its contents were last set.

value.span: 如果控件的内容被修改了，则为 ，否则为 。

span.span: if the control's contents have been modified; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以使用此属性来确定用户是否已修改的内容控件。You can use this property to determine if the user has modified the contents of the control. 你还可以通过以下方式设置此属性在代码中以指示已对更改由应用程序的控制。You can also set this property in code to indicate that changes were made to the control by the application. 此属性可以使用验证和数据保存方法，以确定是否进行了更改控制以便可以验证所更改的内容，或将其保存。This property can be used by validation and data-saving methods to determine if changes were made in a control so the changed contents can be validated or saved.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnAcceptsTabChanged(class System.EventArgs e) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub OnAcceptsTabChanged (e As EventArgs)

span.span: A that contains the event data.

summary.span: 引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在重写在派生类中，一定要调用基类的方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class’s method so that registered delegates receive the event.

summary.span: 用剪贴板的内容替换文本框中的当前选定内容。

span.span: Replaces the current selection in the text box with the contents of the Clipboard.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法仅将文本粘贴到控件如果文本当前存储在剪贴板中。The method will only paste text into the control if text is currently stored in the Clipboard.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ReadOnly { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示 中的文本是否为只读文本。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether text in the is read-only.

value.span: 如果 是只读的，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the is read-only; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当此属性设置为`true`，在运行时，用户不能更改控件的内容，但你仍可更改在代码中的内容。When this property is set to `true`, the contents of the control cannot be changed by the user at runtime, but you can still change the contents in code. 你可以使用此功能，而不是禁用控件属性，以允许要复制的内容。You can use this feature instead of disabling the control with the property to allow the contents to be copied.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Custom Event ReadOnlyChanged As EventHandler

summary.span: 当 属性的值更改时发生。

span.span: Occurs when the value of the property changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换与或追加到一个多行消息。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`ToolStripTextBox1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `ToolStripTextBox1`. 然后，确保与事件处理程序事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#616](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#616)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#616](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#616)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void ScrollToCaret() cil managed

summary.span: 将控件内容滚动到当前插入符号位置。

span.span: Scrolls the contents of the control to the current caret position.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法可滚动控件的内容，直到将脱字号插入控件的可见区域内。This method enables you to scroll the contents of the control until the caret is within the visible region of the control. 如果脱字号位于下方的控件的可见区域方法将滚动控件的内容，直到插入符号可见底部的控件。If the caret is positioned below the visible region of the control, the method will scroll the contents of the control until the caret is visible at the bottom of the control. 如果脱字号位于控件的可见区域的上方，此方法将滚动控件的内容，直到插入符号可见控件顶部。If the caret is positioned above the visible region of the control, this method scrolls the contents of the control until the caret is visible at the top of the control. 可以使用此方法在多行文本框中，以确保当前文本入口点是该控件的可见区域内。You can use this method in a multiline text box to ensure that the current text entry point is within the visible region of the control. > [!NOTE] > 如果该控件没有焦点或已在控件的可见区域中放置插入符号，则此方法无效。This method has no effect if the control does not have focus or if the caret is already positioned in the visible region of the control.

MemberSignature.Value: public void Select (int start, int length);
.method public hidebysig instance void Select(int32 start, int32 length) cil managed
Public Sub Select (start As Integer, length As Integer)
public: void Select(int start, int length);

param.name: start
param.span: 文本框中当前选定文本的第一个字符的位置。

span.span: The position of the first character in the current text selection within the text box.
The number of characters to select.

summary.span: 选择文本框中的文本范围。

span.span: Selects a range of text in the text box.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果你想要设置为控件的文本中的第一个字符的起始位置，设置`start`参数设为 0。If you want to set the start position to the first character in the control's text, set the `start` parameter to 0. 你可以使用此方法以选择子字符串的文本，例如，当整个控件的文本搜索和替换信息。You can use this method to select a substring of text, such as when searching through the text of the control and replacing information. > [!NOTE] > 你可以以编程方式移动插入符号在文本框内通过设置`start`到想要移动到设置脱字号的文本框内的位置参数`length`为零 (0) 值的参数。You can programmatically move the caret within the text box by setting the `start` parameter to the position within the text box where you want the caret to move to and set the `length` parameter to a value of zero (0). 文本框中必须具有顺序情况下，为要移动插入符号的焦点。The text box must have focus in order for the caret to be moved.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SelectAll() cil managed

summary.span: 选定文本框中的所有文本。

span.span: Selects all text in the text box.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法，可选择控件中的所有文本。This method enables you to select all text within the control. 你可以使用此方法与方法，需要对文本进行控制，用于以剪切控件的整个内容，并将其粘贴到剪贴板中选择。You can use this method with the method, which requires text to be selected in the control, to cut the entire contents of the control and paste them into the Clipboard.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ SelectedText { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示控件中当前选定的文本。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating the currently selected text in the control.

value.span: 表示文本框中当前选定文本的字符串。

span.span: A string that represents the currently selected text in the text box.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以将文本分配给此属性来更改中当前选定的文本。You can assign text to this property to change the text currently selected in the . 如果在当前不选定任何文本，此属性返回一个零长度字符串。If no text is currently selected in the , this property returns a zero-length string.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int SelectionLength { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置 中选定的字符数。

span.span: Gets or sets the number of characters selected in the .
The number of characters selected in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以使用此属性以确定是否任何字符当前在所选文本执行操作前选择文本框控件中。You can use this property to determine if any characters are currently selected in the text box control before performing operations on the selected text. 时的值属性设置为一个值大于控件的值的文本内的字符数，属性设置为的值减控件中的文本的整个长度属性 (如果为指定任何值属性)。When the value of the property is set to a value that is larger than the number of characters within the text of the control, the value of the property is set to the entire length of text within the control minus the value of the property (if any value is specified for the property). > [!NOTE] > 你可以以编程方式移动插入符号在文本框内通过设置到想要移动到设置脱字号的文本框内的位置属性的值为零 (0)。You can programmatically move the caret within the text box by setting the to the position within the text box where you want the caret to move to and set the property to a value of zero (0). 文本框中必须具有顺序情况下，为要移动插入符号的焦点。The text box must have focus in order for the caret to be moved.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int SelectionStart { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置 中选定的文本的起始点。

span.span: Gets or sets the starting point of text selected in the .

value.span: 中的选定文本的起始位置。

span.span: The starting position of text selected in the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果控件中不选择任何文本，则此属性将指示新文本的插入点。If no text is selected in the control, this property indicates the insertion point for new text. 如果将此属性设置为控件中文本的长度超出位置，则将最后一个字符后放置在选择开始位置。If you set this property to a location beyond the length of the text in the control, the selection start position will be placed after the last character. 在文本框控件中选定文本，更改此属性可能会降低的值属性。When text is selected in the text box control, changing this property might decrease the value of the property. 如果位置之后控件中的剩余文本由属性小于的值属性、 的值属性会自动减小。If the remaining text in the control after the position indicated by the property is less than the value of the property, the value of the property is automatically decreased. 值属性永远不会导致增加属性。The value of the property never causes an increase in the property. > [!NOTE] > 你可以以编程方式移动插入符号在文本框内通过设置到想要移动到设置脱字号的文本框内的位置属性的值为零 (0)。You can programmatically move the caret within the text box by setting the to the position within the text box where you want the caret to move to and set the property to a value of zero (0). 文本框中必须具有顺序情况下，为要移动插入符号的焦点。The text box must have focus in order for the caret to be moved.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool ShortcutsEnabled { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否启用已定义的快捷方式。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the defined shortcuts are enabled.

value.span: 如果启用快捷方式，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: to enable the shortcuts; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性来启用或禁用以下快捷组合键：Use the property to enable or disable the following shortcut key combinations: |快捷键Shortcut keys|快捷键Shortcut keys| |-------------------|-------------------| |Ctrl+ZCTRL+Z|Ctrl+ECTRL+E| |Ctrl+CCTRL+C|Ctrl+ICTRL+I| |Ctrl+XCTRL+X|Ctrl+YCTRL+Y| |Ctrl+VCTRL+V|Ctrl+BackspaceCTRL+BACKSPACE| |Ctrl+ACTRL+A|Ctrl+DeleteCTRL+DELETE| |Ctrl+LCTRL+L|SHIFT+DELETESHIFT+DELETE| |Ctrl+RCTRL+R|SHIFT+INSERTSHIFT+INSERT| 你可以重写此属性指定其他键盘快捷方式。You can override this property to specify other shortcut keys. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示用于设置各种语法常见属性设置，包括属性。The following code example demonstrates the syntax for setting various common property settings, including the property . summary.span: 获取或设置 控件中文本的对齐方式。

span.span: Gets or sets how text is aligned in a control.

value.span: 枚举值之一，指定控件中文本的对齐方式。

span.span: One of the enumeration values that specifies how text is aligned in the control.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以使用此属性中对齐文本以匹配窗体上的文本的布局。You can use this property to align the text within a to match the layout of text on your form. 例如，如果你的控件位于窗体右侧上，你可以设置属性，并且将与控件而不是默认左对齐方式的右侧对齐文本。For example, if your controls are all located on the right side of the form, you can set the property to , and the text will be aligned with the right side of the control instead of the default left alignment. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示用于设置各种语法常见属性设置，包括属性。The following code example demonstrates the syntax for setting various common property settings, including the property . [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripTextBox.CommonProps#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripTextBox.CommonProps/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripTextBox.CommonProps#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripTextBox.CommonProps/VB/form1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取控件中文本的长度。

span.span: Gets the length of text in the control.

value.span: 的文本中包含的字符数。

span.span: The number of characters contained in the text of the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以使用属性来确定任务，例如搜索特定文本的字符串文本中的控件，其中的总字符数的知识必需的字符串中的字符数。You can use the property to determine the number of characters in a string for tasks such as searching for specific strings of text within the text of the control, where knowledge of the total number of characters is needed.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void Undo() cil managed

summary.span: 撤消文本框中的上一个编辑操作。

span.span: Undoes the last edit operation in the text box.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将撤消的上一个剪贴板或文本更改当文本框控件中执行的操作属性返回`true`。This method will undo the last clipboard or text change operation performed in the text box control if the property returns `true`.
